timeline.message: Throttle the rate of requests made to the ETH1 node.

timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest setting this constant in the constants file so that configurable constants like these are more visible to outsiders and also more visible to us long after we develop this specific module.
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: Done, but I think we should actually move away from that pattern.  Each thing should live in the right place not just be dumped into a catch-all class.  But there's bigger design issues at play there anyway.
replies.author: ajsutton
